title: Fuzzy Logic-Based QFD Strategy for Selecting e-Learning Service Providers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic e-learning concepts and foundational understanding of quality management
context.additional_context: Cultivates practical problem-solving skills for professionals via real-time video instruction in smartphone-centric restricted technology environments

learning_goals: Five quality requirements for selecting e-learning service providers are derived using fuzzy logic-based methods
Correlations between supplier evaluation criteria are analyzed using the QFD House of Quality (HOQ) matrix
Optimal suppliers are selected through hands-on practice of fuzzy data defuzzification processes applying the CFCS technique

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
